truncate-oldest.description: Remove oldest messages first, keep recent context intact

summarize-older.description: Summarize older context beyond threshold, keep recent verbatim

keep-all-with-compression.description: Compress redundant information, keep all semantic content

rag-augmented.description: Augment with RAG retrieval, minimal conversation history

sliding-window.description: Fixed-size sliding window with overlap for continuity

notes.contextWindow: All strategies respect 200K token limit with 20K safety buffer (180K usable)
notes.systemPrompt: System prompts are always preserved regardless of strategy
notes.tokenCounting: Uses Anthropic tokenizer for accurate counting
